If you have real-world experience in this field, we'd love your expertise!

## ‚úÖ What to check

- [ ] Are all nodes the right skills? Are any important concepts missing?
- [ ] Is the learning order / prerequisites logical for a self-learner?
- [ ] Are all linked resources still working and 100% free?
- [ ] Are there better free alternatives (YouTube, articles, interactive tools) for any node?
- [ ] Is the difficulty rating accurate?
- [ ] Is the time estimate realistic?

## üõ†Ô∏è How to contribute

You **don't need to be a programmer** ‚Äî edit the file directly on GitHub.

1. Click the file link above
2. Click the ‚úèÔ∏è pencil icon to edit
3. Follow the schema in [CONTRIBUTING.md](../blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md)
4. Open a PR and link it here with `Closes #<this issue number>`
